opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with prison breach. Before ATKINS, P.J. Appeal, No. 82, March T., 1972, from judgment of sentence of Court of Common Pleas of York County, May T., 1971, No. 197. Submitted March 13, 1972.
opinion.attorneys: Hugh S. Rebert, Assistant Public Defender, and Gerald E. Ruth, Public Defender, for appellant; Joseph E. Erb, Assistant District Attorney, andHarold N. Fitzkee, Jr., District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
